meanings.definition: The activity of riding on a toboggan down a snowy hill.
meanings.sent1: Tobogganing is so much fun in the winter!
meanings.sent2: We went tobogganing on the weekend and had a blast.
meanings.sent3: The kids laughed and screamed while tobogganing down the hill.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the snowy valley as she went tobogganing.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of tobogganing down the hill made it a memorable experience.

meanings.sent2: They tobogganed down the hill with great speed.
meanings.sent3: He tobogganed so fast that his hat flew off!
meanings.sent4: Tobogganing down the hill felt like flying through the snow.
meanings.sent5: The children tobogganed joyfully, enjoying the winter adventure.
